exec: var to_md5 = order_id + order_amount + order_currency + order_description + merchant_pass;
var test = order_id + ' ' + order_amount + ' ' + order_currency + ' ' + order_description + ' ' + merchant_pass;

formdata.description:
Unique key (client_key)
Edfapay merchant key - UUID format value

Transaction ID in the Merchants system
String up to 255 characters

Format depends on currency.
Send Integer type value for currencies with zero-exponent. Example: 1000
Send Float type value for currencies with exponents 2, 3, 4.
Format for 2-exponent currencies: XX.XX Example: 100.99
Pay attention that currencies 'UGX', 'JPY', 'KRW', 'CLP' must be send in the format XX.XX, with the zeros after comma. Example: 100.00
Format for 3-exponent currencies: XXX.XXX Example: 100.999.
Format for 4-exponent currencies: XXX.XXXX Example: 100.9999

Currency
3-letter code

Description of the transaction (product name)
String up to 1024 characters

Special attribute pointing for further tokenization
Y or N (default N)

Customer's name
String up to 32 characters

Customer's surname
String up to 32 characters
String up to 255 characters
2-letter code

Customer's city
String up to 32 characters

ZIP-code of the Customer
String up to 10 characters

Customer's email
String up to 256 characters

Customer's phone
String up to 32 characters

IP-address of the Customer
XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX

URL to which Customer should be returned after 3D-Secure
String up to 1024 characters

Indicates that transaction must be only authenticated, but not captured
Y or N (default N)

Initialization of the transaction with possible following recurring
Y or N (default N)

Special signature to validate your request to Payment Platform Addition in Signature section.
Example: Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): order_number + order_amount + order_currency + order_description + password

request.description:
## Authentication request parameters

The merchant submits an authorization request and as a result of successful response receives the `redirect_url` - link on the Checkout page.

`/payment/initiate`

The authentication performs when the payment is initiated. _**INFO:**_ You need to create an authentication request to start checkout process for the Customers.

## Callback Parameters

Notification endpoint must be of method **POST** and able to accept **form-data** as the content type.

### Successful Sale response (Card Payment)

| **Parameter** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| action | SALE |
| result | SUCCESS |
| status | SETTLED |
| order_id | Transaction ID in the Merchant's system |
| trans_id | Transaction ID in the Payment Platform |
| hash | Special signature, used to validate callback md5(strtoupper(strrev(email).PASSWORD.trans_id.strrev(substr(card_number,0,6).substr(card_number,-4)))) |
| recurring_token | Recurring token (get if account support recurring sales and was initialization transaction for following recurring) |
| schedule_id | It is available if schedule is used for recurring sale |
| card_token | If the parameter req_token was enabled Payment Platform returns the token value |
| card | Card mask |
| card_expiration_date | Card expiration date |
| trans_date | Transaction date in the Payment Platform |
| descriptor | Descriptor from the bank, the same as cardholder will see in the bank statement |
| amount | Order amount |
| currency | Currency |

### Unsuccessful sale response (Card Payment)

| **Parameter** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| action | SALE |
| result | DECLINED |
| status | DECLINED |
| order_id | Transaction ID in the Merchant's system |
| trans_id | Transaction ID in the Payment Platform |
| trans_date | Transaction date in the Payment Platform |
| decline_reason | Description of the cancellation of the transaction |
| hash | Special signature, used to validate callback md5(strtoupper(strrev(email).PASSWORD.trans_id.strrev(substr(card_number,0,6).substr(card_number,-4)))) |

### 3D-Secure transaction response (Card Payment)

| **Parameter** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| action | SALE |
| result | REDIRECT |
| status | 3DS/REDIRECT |
| order_id | Transaction ID in the Merchant's system |
| trans_id | Transaction ID in the Payment Platform |
| hash | Special signature, used to validate callback md5(strtoupper(strrev(email).PASSWORD.trans_id.strrev(substr(card_number,0,6).substr(card_number,-4)))) |
| trans_date | Transaction date in the Payment Platform |
| descriptor | Descriptor from the bank, the same as cardholder will see in the bank statement |
| amount | Order amount |
| currency | Currency |
| redirect_url | URL to which the Merchant should redirect the Customer |
| redirect_params | Object with the parameters. It is array if redirect_params have no data. The availability of the redirect_params depends on the data transmitted by the acquirer. redirect_params may be missing. It usually happens when redirect_method = GET |
| redirect_method | The method of transferring parameters (POST/GET) |
| card | Masked card details |
| card_expiration_date | Card expiration date in MM/YYYY format |

### Sale response (Apple Pay)

| **Parameter** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| id | Transaction ID in the Payment Platform |
| order_number | Transaction ID in the Merchant's system |
| order_amount | Order amount |
| order_currency | Order currency |
| order_description | Order description |
| hash | Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_public_id + order.number + order.amount + order.currency + order.description + merchant.pass |
| type | (sale/refund) |
| status | (success/fail) |

### Sale response (Manafith)\*

| **Parameter** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| id | Transaction ID in the Payment Platform |
| order_number | Transaction ID in the Merchant's system |
| order_amount | Order amount |
| order_currency | Order currency |
| order_description | Order description |
| hash | Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_public_id + order.number + order.amount + order.currency + order.description + merchant.pass |
| type | (sale/refund) |
| status | (success/fail) |
| source | (manafith) |

\*Soon will be launched

## Testing Cards

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mastercard | 5123450000000008 | Y |
| Mastercard | 5111111111111118 | N |
| Visa | 4508750015741019 | Y |
| Visa | 4012000033330026 | N |
| American Express | 345678901234564 | Y |
| American Express | 371449635398431 | N |

| **Expiry Date** | **Transaction Response Gateway Code** |
| --- | --- |
| 01 / 39 | APPROVED |
| 05 / 39 | DECLINED |
| 04 / 27 | EXPIRED_CARD |
| 08 / 28 | TIMED_OUT |
| 01 / 37 | ACQUIRER_SYSTEM_ERROR |
| 02 / 37 | UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE |
| 05 / 37 | UNKNOWN |

| **CSC/CVV** | **CSC/CVV Response Gateway Code** |
| --- | --- |
| 100 | MATCH |
| 101 | NOT_PROCESSED |
| 102 | NO_MATCH |
| American Express |  |
| 1000 | MATCH |
| 1010 | NOT_PROCESSED |
| 1020 | NO_MATCH |

## Request Body

Following is the request body parameters with example

exec: // Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_id + merchant_pass

request.description:
API return's transaction status of specific payment. | **Parameter** | **Type** | **Mandatory, Limitations** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | order_id | String | Required | Order id of merchant system.
**Example:** ORD-001 | | merchant_id | String | Required | Key for the Merchant identification
**Example**: xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx | | hash | String | Required | Special signature to validate your request to Payment Platform.
Example: Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_id + merchant_pass |

### **Request Parameters** | **Parameter** | **Type** | **Mandatory, Limitation** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | gwayId | String | Required | Public transaction id of Payment Gateway
xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx | | order_id | String | Required | Order Id of merchant system | | edfapay_merchant_id | String | Required | Merchant Key indentifier
xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx | | hash | String | Required | Special signature to validate your request to Payment Platform.
**Example:** Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased):payment.id + amount + merchant.pass | | payer_ip | String | Requred | **Example:** 172.34.34.12 | | amount | String | Required | Amount to refund. It is required for particular refund. If amount is not specified the full order amount is settled by default.
**Example:** 0.19 | ### **Response Parameters** | **Parameter** | **Description** | | --- | --- | | statusCode | Status code from API | | responseBody | Body of response
**Example:** "{\\"payment_id\\":\\"c6edb648-5c5a-11ee-a0e7-c64a620ea757\\",\\"result\\":\\"accepted\\"}" |

exec: var to_md5 = order_id + order_amount + order_currency + order_description + merchant_pass;
var test = order_id + ' ' + order_amount + ' ' + order_currency + ' ' + order_description + ' ' + merchant_pass;
